name: Colin McRae: DiRT
description: The beginning of the DiRT era, featuring a wide variety of off-road disciplines including rally, rallycross, and hill climbs.

name: DiRT 2
description: An adrenaline-fueled world tour featuring high-intensity off-road events and a stylized festival atmosphere.

name: DiRT 3
description: Boasts more cars, more locations, and more events than ever before, including the introduction of the Gymkhana mode.

name: DiRT Showdown
description: An arcade-style spin-off focusing on demolition derbies, hoonigan events, and high-impact contact racing.

name: DiRT 4
description: Features the 'Your Stage' system for infinite track generation, blending the realism of Rally with the accessible fun of the numbered series.

name: DiRT Rally
description: The ultimate hardcore rally simulation, offering a punishing and realistic off-road driving experience.

name: DiRT Rally 2.0
description: The sequel to the acclaimed simulator, featuring improved physics, tire degradation, and iconic rally locations from around the globe.

name: WRC 10
description: Celebrate the 50th anniversary of the championship with this hyper-realistic rally simulator featuring historical content and modern stages.

name: Assetto Corsa Rally
description: A rally-focused modification or build for Assetto Corsa, bringing precision physics to the dirt tracks.

name: BeamNG.drive
description: A dynamic soft-body physics vehicle simulator capable of doing just about anything, from realistic crashes to intricate driving challenges.

name: FlatOut
description: The classic demolition racer known for its chaotic tracks, destructible environments, and ragdoll driver physics.

name: FlatOut 2 Enhanced
description: An improved version of the fan-favorite sequel, featuring high-speed street racing and bone-shattering crashes.

name: Wreckfest
description: Expect epic crashes, neck-to-neck fights over the finish line, and brand-new ways for metal to bend in this modern demolition derby classic.

name: Project CARS (Game Of The Year)
description: The ultimate driver journey, featuring all DLC, extra cars, and tracks in one comprehensive package.

name: Project CARS 2 (All DLC)
description: The pinnacle of simulation racing, featuring a massive car roster, dynamic surface physics, and full season effects.
